channel.title: Staff Scouting
channel.description:
[center]Anybody looking for admins I'm available. I don't think doing this is against the rules. If so tell me. I'm just saying im a free admin so private message me to have me be with your server.
(Server must have 100% uptime.[/center]

item.title: Staff Scouting
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“Not Pwnd, post:15, topic:235913”]Why are you back-seat modding. It’s no big deal. Honestly. Most of the mods have disappeared because they are waiting for Mopar to update the forums…

Just lay off[/quote]They’ve been talking about updating the forum for so long, i can’t even remember when Thug-life last told me that.

btw, I am the back-seat mod for the forum. I don’t have to act.

Read full topic

item.title: Staff Scouting
item.dc:creator: @Not_Pwnd Not Pwnd
item.description:
@Not_Pwnd wrote:

Hijack time.

I’m looking for a server, I can program, looking for someone who can host and has 1gb+ ram, and is happy with anything they receive. Add me at holliboom@live.com if you want

item.title: Staff Scouting
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

I’m too good of an example

Btw, post more about how you would help anyone in the first place. That’s a good start.

[quote=“menaru, post:4, topic:235913”]How about this. Right now you don’t seem appealable but if you can make me a standard web client I will gladly make you HEAD Admin.

And Reaper I totally agree with you. btw repaer I was in ur server at a time I was admin but i think that was just a posing server x.x if it wasnt u might remember the name “Josh” awell cya.[/quote]Sorry, don’t remember a josh. =\ must have been a fake.

Read full topic

item.title: Staff Scouting
item.dc:creator: @ilovelamp ilovelamp
item.description:
@ilovelamp wrote:

the reaper is right, people really just don’t want to have an admin with absolutely no experience (not saying you don’t have any) it’s like, would you want to hire a hobo? So go out and post some tutorials, answer questions, get rep, then i think people will want to give you an admin position
good luck

Read full topic

item.title: Staff Scouting
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

seeing as this is a first time post, you don’t seem very appealable for a member of anyone’s staff. Get a little more experience, and maybe they’ll think about it. But i doubt you’re getting admin on any decent server just by asking.

Read full topic
